title: The Soul of Flies
description: A tale of two brothers who meet for the first time on the way to their father's funeral, who they never knew. A surreal journey where memory and dreams collide ensues. Spanish with English subtitles.
warning: WARNING: Deals with the issue of self-harming.

title: Dede
description: A young woman living in a remote mountain village defies her family and centuries of tradition when she falls in love with the wrong man. Georgian and Svan with English subtitles.

title: The Unauthorised Melrose Place Story
description: Discover the drama that went on behind the cameras of the 1990s hit series, Melrose Place, from the arrival of Heather Locklear to the actors begging writers for even wilder storylines to make them fan favourites.

title: Heaven
description: In the first of V.C. Andrews' Casteel family series, the siblings are torn apart when their drunkard father sends them away one by one. Eldest daughter Heaven finds both torment and solace in her new home.

title: Smoke & Mirrors
description: The true story of a man who fooled an entire country. The spy Francisco Paesa returns to Spain after being exiled and is determined to get his revenge against the Spanish government which betrayed him. Spanish with English subtitles.

title: Circle of Deception
description: A small, island community is turned upside down when a local businessman is found dead, leading to an investigation that twists and turns its way through neighbours, ex-wives, and best friends. Based on Ann Rule’s true crime book Practice to Deceive.
warning: WARNING: Deals with the issue of suicide.

title: Stolen By My Mother: The Kamiyah Mobley Story
description: Based on the true story, an 18-year-old girl from Florida discovers she was abducted as a baby and grew up believing her kidnappers were her family.

title: Escaping the Madhouse: The Nellie Bly Story
description: Based on the true events, investigative reporter Nellie Bly (Christina Ricci) feigns mental illness in order to report from the inside of a notorious and ruthless Women's Asylum, run by Matron Grady (Judith Light).

title: Harry And Meghan: Escaping The Palace
description: Explore what really happened inside the palace that drove Harry and Meghan to leave the Royal family behind. From tumultuous family relationships to a growing sense of isolation, the young couple fight to prevent history from repeating itself.

title: Mammuth
description: Gérard Depardieu stars in this comedy drama about a retiree who is forced to go on a road-trip through France on a motorcycle to retrieve the documents he needs to obtain his rightfully due pension. French with English subtitles.

title: Tasting Menu
description: As one of the world's best restaurants opens for its final evening, a couple in the midst of a divorce who made their reservation before they separated reunite for a once-in-lifetime meal. Catalan with English subtitles.

title: Wrapped Up in Christmas
description: Christmas is one of Heather’s (Tatyana Ali, “Fresh Prince of Bel Air”) favourite times of year but she is tasked with being a grinch and cancelling the leases of under-performing stores.

title: The Light on the Hill
description: The mysterious circumstances surrounding the death of a mountain shepherd awakens greed and superstition in a remote Peruvian village. Spanish with English subtitles.

title: Hunt for the Wilderpeople
description: In Taika Waititi's award-winning comedy, moody foster kid Ricky Baker is sent to live in the remote NZ bush with Bella and Hector. When Child Services try to take him back, Ricky refuses, sparking a national manhunt. Starring Julian Dennison and Sam Neill.

title: The Pā Boys
description: This is the story of a band on the road... A group of young Māori men form a reggae band and in the process discover what each wants out of their lives. Starring Francis Kora and Matariki Whatarau.

title: Heart of a Lion
description: A Finnish Neo-Nazi falls in love with a woman who has a bi-racial son and finds himself fighting conflicting feelings. Finnish with English subtitles.

title: Harry and Meghan: A Royal Romance
description: Fall in love with Prince Harry and Meghan Markle all over again, in this dramatisation of their early courtship.

title: Zama
description: Zama, a Spanish officer in the 17th century, is stagnating on a remote island. Awaiting his transfer to Buenos Aires, he waits for the letter from the King to allow him to leave, but the letter never arrives. Spanish with English subtitles.

title: The Most Magnificent Thing
description: An inspirational story about a clever girl with a creative spirit, who learns the power of love and selflessness through hard work and determination.

title: Dark Angel
description: Based on V.C. Andrews' second novel in the Casteel series. Heaven is living in her wealthy grandmother's Boston house and dreams of a new life. But as she reaches out for love, she is ensnared in a sinister web of cruel deceits and hidden passions.

title: Whale Rider
description: A young Māori girl fights to fulfil her destiny in her tribe, struggling against her traditional grandfather and the belief that only a male heir can become the next chief. Starring Keisha Castle-Hughes, Rawiri Paratene.

title: Border
description: A customs officer who can smell fear develops an unusual attraction to a strange traveller while aiding a police investigation which will call into question her entire existence. Swedish with English subtitles.

title: A Killer Among Us
description: When 17-year-old Alex's mother is murdered, the police detective in charge of the case asks her to help find evidence that will lead them to the killer. Inspired by a true story.

title: Sione's 2: Unfinished Business
description: The boys are back! They’re five years older, but are they any wiser? When Bolo goes missing, their Minister brings the boys back together and sends them on a quest. Their mission: to find one Samoan in the world's largest Polynesian city! Starring Robbie Magasiva and Oscar Kightley.

title: Blue is the Warmest Colour
description: Adèle's life is changed when she meets Emma (Léa Seydoux), a young woman with blue hair, who will allow her to discover desire and to assert herself as a woman and as an adult. French with English subtitles

title: I Was Lorena Bobbitt
description: Lorena Bobbitt made tabloid headlines when she cut off her husband's penis with a knife in 1993. This is her journey, from a wide-eyed, immigrant bride to a battered wife, into an unlikely media sensation.
warning: WARNING: Contains themes of violent sexual abuse and disturbing material.

title: Runaway Millionaires
description: What would you do if you found $10 million in your bank account? Runaway Millionaires is the gripping true story of Kara Hurring and Leo Gao, an ordinary New Zealand couple who went on the run after an extraordinary sum of money was mistakenly deposited into their account. Made with the support of NZ On Air.

title: One Thousand Ropes
description: When a father reconnects with his estranged teenage daughter, he is given a rare chance to reshape the future of his family in unexpected ways and put to rest the ghosts that haunt them.

title: Betty and Coretta
description: Angela Bassett and Mary J Blige star as Coretta Scott King and Dr Betty Shabazz, the wives of Dr Martin Luther King and Malcolm X, in this drama about their lives in the wake of their husbands' assassinations.

title: The Last Suit
description: An 88 year-old Jewish tailor runs away from Buenos Aires to Poland, where he intends to find a friend who saved him from certain death at the end of World War II. Spanish with English subtitles.

title: Billionaire Boy
description: Len and his son Joe come form humble beginnings. Their lives are turned upside down when Len invents a new toilet roll, and they become overnight billionaires. Starring David Walliams.

title: Park
description: A group of idle and wilding youths, injured retired athletes, and stray dogs wander the ruins of the abandoned 2004 Athens Olympic Village. Greek with English subtitles.

title: Girl in the Basement
description: A chilling story coming straight from the headlines, Sara is a vibrant teen girl whose controlling father Don (Judd Nelson) imprisons her in a basement for decades, unbeknownst to her family living upstairs.
warning: WARNING: Deals with the issue of rape.

title: Once Upon a Time in Venice
description: Hollywood legend Bruce Willis stars as a Los Angeles detective who seeks out the ruthless gang that stole his dog. Also starring Jason Momoa and John Goodman.

title: Sex Life of Plants
description: After an accident changes her boyfriend's personality, a woman tries to settle down and have children with a new man, but the memories of her lost love still haunt her. Spanish with English subtitles.

title: A Love Yarn
description: A small-town wool shop owner finds herself at a crossroads, when her business is threatened by a handsome American auditor.  Starring Anna Hutchison.

title: The Clan
description: The true story of the Puccio family, who made millions kidnapping and ransoming wealthy people in the 1980s. Spanish with English subtitles.

title: Genghis
description: The relentless, brave warriors from Ghengis Khan's Aravt crew are sent into the woods on a dangerous mission that will put the band of Mongol warriors on the edge of life and death. Mongolian with English subtitles.

title: Taken: The Search for Sophie Parker
description: When 18-year-old Sophie Parker is abducted on a spring break trip to Moscow, her mother, a tough NYPD detective, moves heaven and earth in her frantic quest to save her only child.

title: In A Flash
description: This emotional, original drama tells the true story of the six Elim College students and their teacher who tragically lost their lives in a flash flood at Mangatepopo Gorge in April of 2008. Made with the support of NZ On Air.

title: A Man Called Ove
description: The Oscar-nominated comedy-drama about Ove, an ill-tempered, isolated retiree who spends his days enforcing rules that only he cares about. He's given up on life, but when a boisterous young family moves in next door, an unlikely friendship develops. Swedish with English subtitles.
warning: WARNING: Deals with the issue of suicide.

title: Don't Say a Word
description: When a psychiatrist's daughter is kidnapped, he must use his skills and powers of persuasion to meet the abductor's demands and ensure his daughter's safety. Starring Michael Douglas and Brittany Murphy.

title: Restless Virgins
description: Based on the true story of the sex scandal which rocked New England prep school Milton Academy when the editor of the school newspaper released a sex tape featuring five senior members of the lacrosse team and a classmate.

title: Death Of A Vegas Showgirl
description: The true story of a Las Vegas dancer who vanishes without a trace on the eve of achieving her dream role. The subsequent investigation reveals the twisted depth of this love story gone wrong.

title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
description: Austin Powers, the swinging 60s secret agent, is brought out of cryofreeze in the 90s, to bring down his enemy mastermind, Dr. Evil. Starring Mike Myers.

title: Knight and Day
description: An innocent bystander is thrown into the fast-paced world of espionage, when she shares a flight with a disgraced spy trying to clear his name. Starring Tom Cruise and Cameron Diaz.

title: 7 Boxes
description: Things get complicated for a teenage delivery boy in Paraguay's infamous Market 4, when he's asked to transport seven boxes with unknown contents. Spanish with English subtitles.

title: Girl
description: Lara, a 15-year-old transgender girl, is determined to become a professional ballerina and throws herself into her quest for perfection at a new school. French with English subtitles.
warning: WARNING: Contains nudity and scenes that may disturb.

title: Shoplifters
description: A family of small-time crooks, who rely on shoplifting to cope with a life of poverty in Tokyo, take in a child they find outside in the cold. Japanese with English subtitles.

title: Transfinite
description: This striking sci-fi feature film is composed of seven standalone short stories where supernatural trans and queer people from various cultures use their powers to protect, love, teach, fight and thrive.

title: Snowed-Inn Christmas
description: Jenna Hudson and Kevin Jenner are polar opposites, working for the same online publication in New York City. When they both take the same assignment over the Christmas break, seasonal sparks fly.

title: The Real MVP: The Wanda Durant Story
description: Based on the inspiring true story of NBA great Kevin Durant’s mother Wanda and her dedication to raising one of the greatest basketball players in the world.

title: Le Grand Soir
description: When salesman Jean-Pierre is fired from his job, his punk brother decides it is time to introduce him to the world of the mosh-pit and non-conforming. Winner of the Special Jury Prize at Cannes. French with English subtitles.

title: Aaliyah: Princess of R&B
description: At the height of her music career, Aaliyah died tragically in a plane crash over the Bahamas. This is her story.

title: Disaster Movie
description: A group of friends find themselves up against a torrent of disasters and catastrophes, in a hilarious slapstick parody of disaster movies. Starring Kim Kardashian.

title: Klown
description: To prove he's ready for fatherhood, Frank 'kidnaps' his pregnant girlfriend's 12-year-old nephew and takes him along on his best friend Casper's debauched canoe trip. Danish with English subtitles.
warning: WARNING: Contains strong sexual content, graphic nudity and coarse language.

title: Gangsta Granny
description: Ben thinks that his Granny is boring, until they go on a whirlwind adventure together and he discovers a whole other side of her. Based on the book by David Walliams.

title: Petals on the Wind
description: In the sequel to Flowers in the Attic, The Dollanganger siblings attempt to build normal lives for themselves after being held captive by their grandmother for several years. Trying to forget their sordid past, they come to realise that some secrets can't be left behind.

title: Sione's Wedding
description: When Michael and his three chaotic best mates are banned from attending his brother's wedding, they know something has to change. They get one last chance - find dates to the wedding or be left out in the cold! Starring Robbie Magasiva, Oscar Kightley and Teuila Blakely.

title: A Sister's Secret
description: Twin sisters, one single and one married with children, switch places on their 30th birthday. When one twin is murdered, the survivor must keep up the charade to uncover her killer and protect her sister's family from harm.

title: The Ideal Palace
description: Discover the unlikely true story of a 19th century postman who dedicated 33 years of his life to building an extraordinary palace for his beloved daughter. French with English subtitles.

title: Tazzeka
description: Hailing from the Moroccan village of Tazzeka, Elias meets a top French chef who inspires him to move to Paris and risk living there undocumented to follow his dreams. French / Moroccan Arabic with English subtitles.

title: The Assassin
description: A general's daughter trains to become an exceptional assassin, tasked with eliminating cruel and corrupt leaders in 8th century China. Mandarin with English subtitles.

title: Feliz NaviDAD
description: A high school principal and single dad (Mario Lopez) lost the holiday spirit after also losing his wife during the Christmas season. Now, his 14-year-old daughter looks to bring back the spirit of the season.

title: The Unauthorised Beverly Hills 90210 Story
description: Pop culture phenomenon Beverly Hills 90210 ruled the 90s television landscape. This special reveals the massive highs and lows, and what went on behind the scenes as the young stars rose to fame.

title: Happy Face Killer
description: Based on the true story, FBI agent Melinda Gand is brought in to help stop the Happy Face Killer, a murderer who is taunting authorities with disturbing notes and confessions signed with a happy face. Starring David Arquette.

title: Dangerous Matrimony
description: Years after a woman was mysteriously thrown overboard and left to die in the Caribbean, her sister  becomes determined to find the killer and bring them to justice.

title: Kiwi
description: The extraordinary story of a remarkable horse that became a racing legend when he ran from last to first over the final 300 metres at Flemington to win The Melbourne Cup. Made with the support of NZ On Air.

title: In Bed with Victoria
description: When a 30-something workaholic criminal lawyer bumps into her ex-husband, a drug dealer she successfully defended in court, and her good friend Vincent at a wedding, the series of events turns her life upside down. French with English subtitles.

title: Pool Boy Nightmare
description: When Gale ends her brief affair with pool cleaner Adam, he seduces Gale's teenage daughter Becca, using her as an unsuspecting pawn in a twisted game of revenge.

title: Slumdog Millionaire
description: Award-winning film about a street-smart teenager from Mumbai, who is accused of cheating on Who Wants to Be a Millionaire.

title: Bury The Past
description: When a women strikes out at her abusive husband, she fears her story will not be believed as he is a police officer and flees into hiding. But the past isn't always left behind so easily.

title: Abducted: The Mary Stauffer Story
description: Inspired by a true story, teacher and missionary Mary Stauffer and her eight-year-old daughter were held captive by a former student who had become obsessed with her. Starring Alyson Hannigan.

title: Sleeping with Danger
description: Grace's dream man Paul quickly becomes her nightmare as a jealous rage leads to a brutal attack. Fearing for her life and the safety of other women, Grace works with the police to bring Paul to justice. Inspired by Ann Rule’s true crime collection Mortal Danger and Other True Cases.

title: Glory
description: When a reclusive Bulgarian railway worker turns in millions in cash he found spilled on the tracks, his life is turned upside down by the chaos of bureaucracy. Bulgarian with English subtitles.

title: Ixcanul
description: On the slopes of an active volcano in Guatemala, a marriage is arranged for 17-year-old María by her Kaqchikel parents to a man who is working in the city, a world María knows nothing of. Spanish with English subtitles.

title: Fresh Meat
description: After a prison breakout goes violently wrong, a dysfunctional gang of criminals hide out in the home of a middle-class Māori family. But they soon realise this particular family have a taste for human flesh... Starring Temuera Morrison and Kate Elliot.

title: Mood Indigo
description: The wealthy and inventive Colin endeavours to find a cure for his lover Chloe after she's diagnosed with an unusual illness caused by a flower growing in her lungs. Starring Audrey Tautou. French with English subtitles.

title: The Lost Wife Of Robert Durst
description: Based on the true story of convicted killer and real estate mogul Robert Durst; pull back the curtain on his twisted world and explore what may have happened between him and his forgotten first wife Kathie.

title: Flowers in the Attic
description: Based on the controversial book series, Flowers in the Attic tells the story of the four Dollanganger siblings, held captive and mistreated by their cruel grandmother. Starring Kiernan Shipka and Heather Graham.

title: The Orator
description: Small in stature and humble, Saili lives a simple life with his beloved wife and daughter in an isolated, traditional village in the islands of Samoa. Forced to protect his land and family, Saili must face his fears and seek the right to speak up for those he loves.

title: Whitney
description: Witness the headline-making relationship between the iconic singer, actress, producer and model Whitney Houston and singer and songwriter Bobby Brown as directed by Academy Award® nominee Angela Bassett.

title: The Last Diamond
description: A convicted thief on parole is lured back into his old ways, in a plot to steal a famous, priceless diamond. French with English subtitles.

title: My Wedding and Other Secrets
description: When Emily Chu falls in love with and secretly marries a European guy, she faces disownment from her traditional Hong Kong-born parents in this funny and heartfelt Kiwi rom-com.

title: P.S. I Love You
description: Gerry is kept alive in the heart of his widowed wife, Holly, when she discovers he's left her a series of messages. Starring Hilary Swank and Gerard Butler.

title: Secrets of Eden
description: John Stamos stars as a small-town pastor who becomes the prime suspect in a murder case in the drama based on the novel by New York Times best-selling author Chris Bohjalian.

title: Trapped: The Alex Cooper Story
description: Based on the real life of Alex Cooper, whose parents sent her to a conversion therapy home when she was 15 after she revealed she was gay. This is the story of how she orchestrated her escape and made legal history.
warning: WARNING: Deals with the issue of suicide.

title: One Last Deal
description: An elderly art dealer investigates the history behind an unsigned painting that promises to bring his suffering career to a successful end. Finnish with English subtitles.

title: I Am Somebody's Child: The Regina Louise Story
description: The real-life story of Regina Louise, an African American girl who navigated more than 30 foster homes and psychiatric facilities before age 18, and Jeanne, the one woman who believed in her. Starring Ginnifer Goodwin.

title: Ring of Fire
description: Jewel stars as country legend June Carter Cash in this drama about her life, from her beginnings in the rural mountains of Virginia to her turbulent but enduring marriage to Johnny Cash.

title: Divergent
description: Based on the bestselling book series, an outcast must face her destiny within a dystopian world divided into factions. Starring Shailene Woodley.

title: Mr Stein Goes Online
description: Pierre, a 75-year-old widower, discovers online dating websites but uses a picture of his granddaughter's boyfriend Alex as his profile picture. When a young woman asks to meet, he sends Alex in his place. French with English subtitles.

title: Poppy
description: The heartfelt, celebrated story of a spirited young woman, determined to follow her dreams despite her disability. Made with the support of NZ On Air.

title: Catching the Black Widow
description: The explosive true story of a cold-hearted murderer brought to justice by her sister-in-law. Made with the support of NZ On Air.

title: Toni Braxton: Unbreak My Heart
description: The life story of singer/songwriter and producer, Toni Braxton, from her discovery by mega producers L.A. Reid and Kenneth “Babyface” Edmonds, to her battle with Lupus and her very public divorce.

title: Born To Dance
description: Tu Kaea has the chance to audition for K-Crew, the best hip-hop crew in the country, but he has to go behind the backs of his home crew and his best friend Benjy. Starring Stan Walker, Tia-Taharoa Maipi and Parris Goebel.

title: Kalo Pothi
description: In a war-torn Nepalese village, Prakash and Kiran, two boys from different castes, bond over their affection for a hen whose eggs they hope to sell to help support Prakash's family. Nepali with English subtitles.

title: Before We Vanish
description: Three aliens with superior technology, skill and strength arrive and take possession of human bodies, threatening to destroy Earth's population. Japanese with English subtitles.

title: Lady Chatterley's Lover
description: After her husband is injured fighting in World War I, a beautiful young aristocrat embarks on a forbidden affair with a servant. Based on the novel by D. H. Lawrence.

title: VF48 Hours Film Festival 2021
description: NZ's largest guerilla filmmaking competition is back for its 19th year, showcasing some of our best amateur films, all shot within one weekend.

title: Clash
description: A number of detainees from different political and social backgrounds are brought together in the back of a police truck during the turmoil that followed the ousting of Egyptian President Mohamed Morsi in 2013. Arabic with English subtitles.

title: Fallen Hearts
description: Based on the third novel in V.C. Andrews' Casteel family series. After her wedding, Heaven is lured to live amongst the Tatterton family's wealth and privilege. But the ghosts of her past rise up once more, threatening her new life with scandal.

title: Splinters
description: Explore the intersections of sexual identity, family, and small-town life, in this heartfelt drama about a young woman reassessing her relationship with her mother following the death of her father.

title: Jim Henson's Turkey Hollow
description: A family visit their aunt (Mary Steenburgen) in the quaint town of Turkey Hollow, but are quickly drawn into tracking down an elusive monster the locals dismiss as a legend. Narrated by Ludacris.

title: Harry & Meghan: Becoming Royal
description: Continue the love story of newlyweds Prince Harry and Meghan Markle in this dramatisation of their pivotal first year of marriage as they try to find the balance between honouring Royal tradition and staying true to their beliefs.

title: The Tender Trap
description: The true story of Sharon Armstrong, Kiwi grandmother and public servant, who became the victim of an online romance scam that almost cost her her freedom. Starring Rima Te Wiata. Made with the support of NZ On Air.

title: A Murder to Remember
description: Javier and Robin celebrate their one-year anniversary on a camping trip. But when Javier ends up dead, Robin finds herself alone in the wilderness, forced to place her life in the hands of a mysterious stranger. Based on Ann Rule's true crime collection Empty Promises.
warning: WARNING: Deals with the issue of rape.

title: Happy End
description: A well-to-do French family living in Calais deals with a series of setbacks and crises, while ignoring the grim conditions of the refugee camps near their home. French with English subtitles.
warning: WARNING: Deals with the issue of suicide.

title: In Dark Places
description: The gripping true story of Teina Pora, an innocent man imprisoned for two decades for a crime he did not commit and an ex-cop's heroic battle to win him his freedom. Made with the support of NZ On Air.

title: The Divine Order
description: In 1971, a young housewife organises the women of her small Swiss town to petition for the right to vote. Swiss German with English subtitles.

title: The Queen
description: Helen Mirren stars as Queen Elizabeth II, navigating the shocking and unforeseen period following Princess Diana's death.

title: A Sister's Nightmare
description: Sibling rivalry returns to torment Jane, a young police officer, after her older sister Cass is released from the hospital for the criminally insane. Starring Natasha Henstridge.

title: Supernova
description: Fifteen-year-old Meis lives in the back of beyond with her family, in a house that cars often crash into. Despite her grand aspirations she's going nowhere; waiting for the next car to crash into the house. Dutch with English subtitles.

title: Return to Zero
description: Based on a true story, a couple mourning the loss of their stillborn child discover that they are pregnant again and must come together to face a turbulent and terrifying pregnancy. Starring Minnie Driver.
warning: WARNING: Contains scenes that may disturb.

title: Insurgent
description: In the Divergent sequel, Beatrice continues the fight against the forces that threaten society, while also confronting her own inner demons. Starring Shailene Woodley.

title: Victoria Gotti: My Father's Daughter
description: Based on her real life story, go deep into the world of Victoria Gotti as she grew up as the daughter of mob boss John Gotti and all the glamour, glitz and unique hardships that went with it.

title: A Gang Story
description: Based on the true story of Edmond Vidal and Serge Suttel who formed the notorious Gang des Lyonnais in the 1970s. Now in his 60s, Edmond has left crime behind to focus on family, until Serge comes back into the picture. French with English subtitles.

title: Perfect High
description: A star high-school dancer starts using prescription painkillers after an injury sidelines her. Feeling isolated, she is adopted by a popular group and their pill-sharing and 'pharm' parties lead to a life-altering addiction. Inspired by a true story.

title: A Very Merry Toy Store
description: Connie (Melissa Joan Hart), a young single mum, and Will each run rival small town toy stores, when the big chain toy store has its grand opening right before Christmas. Can they save their businesses, and maybe find love in the process?

title: The Evil Twin
description: Emily escapes from an abusive relationship by moving back to her hometown only to discover she has a long-lost twin. But her newfound sister might be a murderer.

title: Kidnapped: The Hannah Anderson Story
description: After a teenager is rescued from the man who abducted her and held her prisoner, questions emerge about the nature of their relationship, in this chilling film based on a true story.

title: Stockholm Pennsylvania
description: Golden Globe winner Saoirse Ronan stars as a young woman who was kidnapped as a child and her strained relationship with her mother (Emmy winner Cynthia Nixon) as she readjusts when she is returned home.

title: Mistress Mercy
description: This docu-drama dives beneath the sensational headlines to unravel the truth about a murder case that rocked New Zealand and catapulted teenage dominatrix Renee Chignell and cricket umpire Peter Plumley Walker into the national consciousness. Made with the support of NZ On Air.

title: Battlestar Galactica: The Plan
description: Set during the events of the Battlestar Galactica series but from the Cylons' perspective, two versions of the powerful Cylon known as Cavil set out to destroy the human survivors of the attack against the Twelve Colonies.

title: Web of Dreams
description: Based on the fifth novel in V.C. Andrews' Casteel family series. The family mystery is unlocked in the final instalment, following Heaven's mother Leigh as she escapes Farthinggale Manor and falls into the arms of Luke Casteel Senior.
warning: WARNING: Deals with the issue of rape.

title: If There Be Thorns
description: In the third installment of the Dollanganger Series, siblings Christopher and Cathy are playing happy families when a ghost from their past arrives in their neighbourhood.

title: Manson's Lost Girls
description: The psychedelic summer of ’69 comes to life in this dramatic glimpse into the bizarre world of Charles Manson, as told through the stories the young women who fell under his demonic spell.

title: The Dance Exponents – Why Does Love?
description: The Dance Exponents – Why Does Love? tells the story of the rise and fall and rise of one of New Zealand’s most loved and iconic bands, The Exponents. Made with the support of NZ On Air.

title: He Loves Me
description: Heather Locklear stars as Laura, a woman who is devastated when she discovers her husband is cheating on her, despite having a torrid affair of her own. While she desperately tries to save her marriage, Laura becomes increasingly paranoid and delusional.

title: Katy
description: 11 year old Katy is a funny, energetic, daredevil oldest sister in a big, blended family. Her life changes in dramatic ways when she suffers an injury and is unable to walk again.

title: Last Chance for Christmas
description: When an injury puts the reindeer Prancer out of action, Santa's stableman finds himself falling in love with the animal's owner. Starring Hilarie Burton.

title: The C Word
description: An adaptation of Lisa Lynch's candid book about her experience with breast cancer, this drama is a defiant, ballsy and surprisingly funny story of life, love and cancer.

title: The Guilty
description: A suspended police officer assigned to dispatch duty in an emergency call centre enters a race against time when he answers a call from a kidnapped woman. Danish with English subtitles.

title: A House on Fire
description: Debora Green is a brilliant doctor with a genius IQ who appears to be living the American dream. But behind the curtain are a rocky marriage and a drug and alcohol problem that lead to tragedy. Based on the best-selling true crime novel by Ann Rule.

title: Thale
description: Crime-scene cleaners Leo and Elvis are working deep in the Norwegian woods when they discover a secret passage where they encounter Thale, a beautiful young woman who sings, but does not speak. Norwegian with English subtitles.

title: Story Of A Girl
description: When an explicit sex video of a 13-year-old girl hits the internet, her life changes forever. From social stigma to the enduring rage of her father (Kevin Bacon), she longs to escape a life defined by her past.

title: Seeds of Yesterday
description: In the final installment of the Dollanganger Series, the Sheffield family come together for a reunion at the Foxworth estate. The cursed mansion is the source of many secrets and haunting memories for them all.

title: Boy
description: Taika Waititi film set on NZ's East Coast in 1984. Boy loves three things, Michael Jackson, his pet goat and his absent criminal father. When his dad returns to find a bag of buried money, Boy and his little brother get to know him again.

title: Baby Sellers
description: Inspired by true events, an immigration agent goes undercover to expose a shocking international criminal enterprise of infant trafficking led by a ruthless woman who runs an adoption agency. Starring Emmy-winner Kirstie Alley.

title: A War Story
description: In 1997, Osama bin Laden declared war on the USA and Pulitzer Prize winning CNN correspondent Peter Arnett embarked on a mission to locate and interview him. A War Story follows the dramatic events leading up to the interview and the Kiwi journalist's horror on 9/11, as he recalled bin Laden's veiled threats. Funded by NZ On Air.

title: Mariposa
description: The flapping of a butterfly divides Romina and Germán's universe into two parallel realities: In the first one, Romina is raised as an adopted sister to Germán. In the other, they are friends who have a sexual relationship. Spanish with English subtitles.

title: Conan The Barbarian
description: In an empire ruled by evil, a barbarian warrior swears vengeance on the warlord who murdered his family. Starring Jason Momoa.

title: The 7.39
description: In the romantic drama written by David Nicholls, two commuters begin talking after fighting for a seat on a train. Carl is happily-married, Sally's engaged, but after they meet their lives dramatically change course. Starring David Morrissey, Sheridan Smith, and Olivia Colman.

title: Britney Ever After
description: The tumultuous story of pop icon Britney Spears’ rise to fame, fall from grace and eventual triumphant resurrection, firmly securing her position as one of the world’s greatest entertainers.

title: Gates of Paradise
description: Based on the fourth novel in V.C. Andrews' Casteel family series. Annie is taken to Farthinggale Manor by the possessive Tony Tatterton. Pining for her family, Annie yearns to see her half-brother Luke again, but her hopes and dreams are darkened by the sinister Casteel spell.

title: Family Pictures
description: Two women lead very similar lives - both their husbands travel for work and their daughters are about to leave the nest. But when their daughters meet, they discover a shocking secret that threatens to tear both families apart.

title: Long Shot
description: A journalist reunites with his childhood crush who is now one of the most influential women in the world. Sparks fly when the unlikely pair start working together. Starring Seth Rogen and Charlize Theron.

title: Beaches
description: An update to a classic tear-jerker, we witness the lifelong friendship between two women that sprung from a chance meeting on Venice Beach. Starring Idina Menzel and Nia Long.

title: Resolve
description: Based on the true story of Chris Crean, who took a stand against gang violence in his community only to become a target himself. Made with the support of NZ On Air.

title: Gone Mom: The Disappearance of Jennifer Dulos
description: Based on the true story of Jennifer Dulos, a wealthy, mother-of-five who mysteriously vanished on May 24, 2019. After she disappeared, her husband claimed she staged her own disappearance like in the film Gone Girl.
warning: WARNING: Deals with the issue of suicide.

title: Homesick
description: An ambitious cellist is invited to represent Germany at an international contest. As she begins to prepare for the competition, stress starts to take over her everyday life and soon reality and imagination blur. German with English subtitles.

title: Good Manners
description: Clara, a lonely nurse from the outskirts of São Paulo, is hired by the mysterious and wealthy Ana as the nanny for her unborn child. The two women develop a strong bond, but a fateful night changes their plans. Portuguese with English subtitles.
